pr_title: Create stub files from Java source files

Create stub files from Java source files.

Co-authored-by: zhangjiangqige <zhangjiangqige@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: This comment doesn't convey what the routine does.  Please make it more specific.  The same feedback applies to other comments in the file.
timeline.author: mernst

timeline.bodyText: Please say what they are: one or more directories.

timeline.bodyText:
What is a "source root"?
(Also, here and elsewhere clarify "process".

timeline.bodyText: Nit: I would rename Minimization to Minimize or Minimizer throughout, to make the terminology shorter and more active.
timeline.author: mernst

timeline.bodyText: Does it do so in place?
timeline.author: mernst

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:typetools/checker-framework into java-minimizer

timeline.bodyText: Can you either remove this or add a flag to turn it on/off?
timeline.author: smillst

timeline.message: Merge branch 'java-minimizer' of github.com:wmdietl/checker-framework into java-minimizer
Rename the resource directory jdk11 to annotated-jdk. (#3262)
Make field protected because it is referenced from Javadoc of protected method
Update IntelliJ IDEA instructions (fix broken URLs)
Use JavaStubifier to minimize the annotated jdk.

timeline.bodyText: I had to add this; otherwise, the interface java files were just removed.  Methods in interfaces are public even if they are not marked as such.  An interface could have a default method whose body should be removed, so we may want to fix this some other way.
timeline.author: smillst

replies.bodyText:
The logic in removeIfPrivateOrPkgPrivate looks at the visibility of the interface itself and removes an interface if it is private or package private.
If the interface itself isn't visible, why should we keep it?
Which interface did you look at?
replies.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText:
java.util.Map, for example, is remove in MinimizerCallback#process because it has no methods marked as public or protected.
It's fine to remove the interface the interface is private or package private, which I suppose you can do by calling removeIfPrivateOrPkgPrivate before the return below.
replies.author: smillst

replies.bodyText: I've added some logic to handle implicitly public members. Map looks fine to me and private interfaces are still removed.
replies.author: wmdietl

timeline.message: Handle members of interfaces as implicitly public.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:typetools/checker-framework into java-minimizer

timeline.bodyText: This is removing AbstractStringBuilder because it is a package private class.  However, some of the methods are exposed in public classes.
timeline.author: smillst

replies.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText: That seems like a reasonable choice for now.  If the stubs remain too big (or if we have accidentally left something out), we can revisit the design later.
replies.author: mernst
